author: Anonymous Scale
title: iCliker question on 04/05/22 (last Tuesday)
question:
Hi Prof,

I remember that iCliker question from last Tuesday was asking about the difficulty level of a starter problem. Shouldn't it only grade the attendance, not correctness? I'm just curious why I lost 1 point. Thanks!
student_answer: Yes it was specifically mentioned in lecture that it would be an attendance grade.  If it doesn't reflect that already I'm sure it will be soon.
